sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• My asset has been declined from the Asset Store
  • I would like more feedback to understand why my asset has been declined

sections.title: Cause
content: The Asset Review team have high standards for assets sold on our Asset Store. As a result, they cannot accept every asset that is submitted.

sections.title: Resolution
content: The Review Team usually give specific feedback via email. If you have not received a clear reason why your asset has been declined, it may be due to one of these common reasons:

• There is already an asset similar to yours on the store. We want to encourage diversity on our Store as much as possible.
  • The art style needs work as it does not currently meet our standards. We want to host the best possible assets for our users.
  • Your asset does not meet the submission guidelines. Please review these to be sure that you have included all necessary files

sections.title: More Information
content: For more guidance on submission, please see this document.
